mapper.select: SELECT sri.role_code FROM sys_role_info sri LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru ON sru.role_id = sri.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_info sui ON sui.id = sru.user_id WHERE sui.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT sai.* FROM sys_app_info sai LEFT JOIN sys_role_app sra ON sra.app_id = sai.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = sra.role_id WHERE sri.role_code = #{roleCode} AND sai.delete_flag = 0 AND sai.status = 0
SELECT smi.* FROM sys_menu_info smi LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.menu_id = smi.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = srm.role_id WHERE sri.role_code = #{roleCode}
SELECT sai.url FROM sys_api_info sai LEFT JOIN sys_role_api sra ON sra.api_id = sai.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = sra.role_id WHERE sri.role_code = #{roleCode}
SELECT sai.* FROM sys_api_info sai LEFT JOIN sys_role_api sra ON sra.api_id = sai.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = sra.role_id WHERE sri.role_code = #{roleCode}
SELECT org.* FROM sys_org org LEFT JOIN sys_role_org sro ON sro.org_id = org.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = sro.role_id WHERE sri.role_code = #{roleCode}
SELECT area.* FROM video_area area LEFT JOIN role_video_area rva ON rva.area_id = area.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = rva.role_id WHERE sri.role_code = #{roleCode}
SELECT sri.id, sri.role_name, sri.role_desc, sri.status, sri.created_by FROM sys_role_info sri WHERE sri.delete_flag = 0
